ShipmentEventList.description: List of events related to shipments of products.

AmazonOrderId.description: The unique identifier of the Amazon order associated with the shipment event

SellerOrderId.description: The unique identifier of the seller's order associated with the shipment event

MarketplaceName.description: The name of the marketplace where the event occurred

OrderChargeList.description: List of order charges associated with the shipment event

OrderFeeList.description: List of order fees associated with the shipment event

OrderFeeAdjustmentList.description: List of order fee adjustments related to the shipment event

DirectPaymentList.description: List of direct payments associated with the shipment event

PostedDate.description: The date and time when the event was posted

ShipmentItemList.description: List of shipment items associated with the shipment event

ShipmentItemAdjustmentList.description: List of shipment item adjustments related to the shipment event
